ygData.subject: Re: New list
ygData.msgSnippet: Plains Pebble is for an Iskar Monk Quest, Druids can Imbue them for making Magical Armor, and supposedly they can be used in Water Extractors with Water Reeds
ygData.messageBody:
Plains Pebble is for an Iskar Monk Quest, Druids can Imbue them for
making Magical Armor, and supposedly they can be used in Water
Extractors with Water Reeds (foraged in LOIO) to make water.

Bixle Berry Pie is used in a quest in Calabis.

Water Ring is used in Rangers Ivy Etched armor and in a Magician item
quest. (I think the circle of Mist).


--- In EQ-Quest@egroups.com, "L. Kristine" <ladykristine@y...> wrote:
> Here it is, a new list of items. Items with asterisk are foraged.
>
> *Plains Pebble
> a rare leaf
> *Plains Root
> Fetid bass (assorted weights)
> *Basilisk egg
> *Oak bark
> *Kromdul Carrot (this sucker weighs 5 pounds!!!)
> *Bixle Berry Pie
> Evergreen Ivy Ringband
> Misscribed Lifetap
> Misscribed Gate
> Water Ring (dropped from Aqua Goblins in Dagnor's)
> *Timorous Coconut
> *Timorous Tuna
>
> Thanks!
>
> Teaa
> Cazic Thule
